body: Iranian protesters demonstrate in Tehran, Shiraz, Isfahan,Rasht and several other cities. Here is a video film shows Sharif University students in Tehran chant against 'dictator'.

title: Iran: Protesters back to Streets

sentence: Iranian protesters demonstrate in Tehran, Shiraz, Isfahan,Rasht and several other cities.
